medical_history.chief_complaint: Growth retardation, low serum selenium level, and thyroid test abnormalities.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The proband was 8.9 years old when assessed for short stature. He had proportionate shortness with a delayed bone age of 3.1 years. Concerns about his stature arose 2 months after arriving in the United Kingdom, with symptoms persisting and showing no changes despite treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Low serum selenium level and thyroid function abnormalities including high serum T4 and low T3 concentrations.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents and a sister were heterozygous for the same mutation but showed no growth or thyroid test abnormalities.
